meaningMnemonic:
If you <kanji>shift</kanji> the place you <kanji>dwell</kanji>, that’s called <vocabulary>migration</vocabulary>.
 
You can use this word whether you migrate to a different country or a different town inside the same country.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
